MacKenzie is the Bay Area’s premier, boutique marketing and communications agency. From brand development and creative design to public relations, internal communications, and crisis communications management, our team of experienced professionals delivers full-service solutions with a client-first approach.

What our clients think

  • “MacKenzie Communications promises results and that is what they’ve delivered for me consistently. Wonderful to work with too.”

    – George Machun, California State University Monterey Bay

  • “MacKenzie is a GREAT company. They have a clear direction on what they do and they have great people who bring your vision to life!”

    – James S. Lanich, Ph.D., Educational Results Partnership President & CEO

They provide the expertise of a full service agency but with the personal attention of a dedicated account manager who makes me feel as though I am their only client – I couldn’t ask for more.”

    – Dignity Health Bay Area
